comments.body:
The `byIndex` is no longer needed after we removed `unbind` in `ExpressionEncoder`.

The `toIndex` looks unnecessary, we can just access `Attribute` in `schema` by index, instead of turning it into a map.
Sure, I just don't see the point of deleting internal utility code when its simple/correct.  Next time I solve a similar problem I'm going to go looking for these methods.
